item.title: ðŸŒ¾ Feed reboot and the sludge factory (10/2024)
item.description:
Welcome to Version 3.0 of the TYOMA.COOL feed!!

This time, to avoid having to update one million things all at once, I'm going to just keep this to a monthly update of my overall goings-on. 90% of updates will be website-related, but you'll also get some updates from the other sections of the Tyomaverse, like my blog entries and character bios on my Toyhou.se page. This is the new all-in-one source for any and all Tyoma news!

Without further ado, here's what I've gotten up to this month:

Website updates

  • Finished building the sludge factory! For those unaware, this site has been hidden away on the "Audiophilia" tab of the main site's sidebar. It's where I plan to dump alot of music-related thoughts, concert logs, and my playlists. I finally added the Playlists section which I'm working on adding all my monthly playlists to!
  • 6 new images added to the 2024 Gallery.

Other sites

Welcome to Version 3.0 of the TYOMA.COOL feed!!

This time, to avoid having to update one million things all at once, I'm going to just keep this to a monthly update of my overall goings-on. 90% of updates will be website-related, but you'll also get some updates from the other sections of the Tyomaverse, like my blog entries and character bios on my Toyhou.se page. This is the new all-in-one source for any and all Tyoma news!

Without further ado, here's what I've gotten up to this month:

Website updates

  • Finished building the sludge factory! For those unaware, this site has been hidden away on the "Audiophilia" tab of the main site's sidebar. It's where I plan to dump alot of music-related thoughts, concert logs, and my playlists. I finally added the Playlists section which I'm working on adding all my monthly playlists to!
  • 6 new images added to the 2024 Gallery.

Other sites

  • Toyhouse: Created pages for Forty-Six (no bio yet) and my Termina OC Jabari. Added bios for Hoshiko and Artemis.
  • Github: I made a skin for RSS Guard based on Cecilia May's Primary skin for Obsidian.MD!
  • Dreamwidth: 1 new blog entry: "in which tyoma realizes he's in too deep".

Personal updates

  • Stopped taking all my meds. Let's see how that goes! (I seem fine so far??)
  • Bought a pair of shorts that're too small so now I'm trying to lose weight to wear them.
  • I'm really into eating skyr lately...
  • Going girl mode so I've been worrying less about looking masculine and started wearing eye makeup again.
  • Finally up to an average daily step count of 3500!

That's all, folks! See you next month!
